name: Hand by Koutbo6.com
description:
Koutbo6.com brings you a variant of Gin/Rummy that is very popular in the Middle East. The goal is to create melds from the cards you have in your hand until you manage to get rid of all the cards that you hold before everyone else.

Learn and enjoy playing Hand against your friends or enjoy challenging other people in our daily friendly tournaments. Play either a Hand game of 4 or 5 players.

Or upgrade to a pro account and participate in solo challenges, pro tournaments, and see your rating increase to be listed in our leaderboards
